fields.label: Does your business have customers that are Managed Investment Schemes registered by ASIC?
Does your business have customers that are unregistered Managed Investment Schemes (wholesale clients only)?
Does your business have customers that are trusts subject to Commonwealth statutory oversight?
Does your business have customers that are government superannuation funds?
Does your business have customers that are any other type of trust?
Does your program include risk-based systems to be satisfied that the trust exists?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to satisfy the reporting entity that the trust exists.

fields.label: Does your program include systems to ensure the name of each trustee and beneficiary (or class) has been provided?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to collect and record the names of trustees and beneficiaries.

fields.label: Does your business collect the full name of the trust?
Does your business collect the full business name of the trustee (if any)?
Does your business collect the type of the trust?
Does your business collect the country in which the trust was established?
Does your business collect the full name of the settlor (unless the contribution is <$10,000 or the settlor is deceased)?
If a trustee is an individual, does your business collect Part 4.2 KYC information for at least one individual trustee?
If a trustee is a company, does your business collect Part 4.3 KYC information for at least one company trustee?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine if additional KYC information should be collected beyond the minimums?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems for determining when additional KYC information relating to the trust's existence is required.

fields.label: Does your business verify the full name of the trust?
If a trustee is an individual, does your business verify Part 4.2 KYC information for at least one individual trustee?
If a trustee is a company, does your business verify Part 4.3 KYC information for at least one company trustee?
Does your business verify the full name of the settlor (unless exempt)?
Does your program include risk-based systems to determine whether and to what extent additional KYC info should be verified?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems used to determine if additional information verification is required.

fields.label: Does your business have regard to ML/TF risk when determining additional information collection/verification requirements?
fields.detail-label: How does your business incorporate ML/TF risk into the determination of additional collection and verification?

fields.label: Does your business use the simplified trustee verification procedure for eligible trusts?
Does your business verify that the trust is an eligible registered or regulated trust as per the simplified procedure?
Does your program include a procedure to identify the beneficial owners of the trust?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure used to identify the beneficial owners of the trust.

fields.label: Does your business identify the beneficial owners of the trust in accordance with Part 4.12?

groups.title: Part 4.4: Trustees and Trusts
groups.description: General systems to satisfy trust existence and identification of parties.

groups.title: Simplified Verification
groups.description: Procedures for low-risk registered or regulated trusts.

groups.title: Trustees and Beneficiaries
groups.description: Detailed collection and verification of individuals and entities behind the trust.
